H0.text: Who was shot for spying by the French in 1917. Sidney Reilly

H1.text: Who was shot for spying by the French in 1917. Robert Digby-Jones

H2.text: Who was shot for spying by the French in 1917. Carl Hans Lody

H3.text: Who was shot for spying by the French in 1917. Mata-Hari

A4.text: Zelle was executed by a firing squad consisting of 12 French soldiers just before dawn on 15 October 1917.

A5.text: She was tried on 24 July, accused of spying for Germany and consequently causing the deaths of at least 50,000 soldiers.
